summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to J Epstein & Co Inc for shipping services rendered. It details various charges, including transportation and special handling fees, and includes multiple entries for shipments made by the company. The invoice indicates a total amount due and provides payment instructions.

keyFacts: The document is an invoice from FedEx to J Epstein & Co Inc dated December 18, 2000.
The total amount due on the invoice is $138.41.
Multiple shipments are detailed in the invoice, with various senders and recipients.
The invoice includes charges for transportation and special handling.
The document indicates a payment due date of January 2, 2001.
